series_description: This series documents the process of reimbursing end users recycling waste tires for fuel, product manufacturing, and/or engineering, as well as tracking the origin of tires used by recyclers. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, waste tire certificates, and correspondence.

This series documents the annual process by which waste tire haulers voluntarily apply to be placed on the Departmentâ€™s website for Registered Waste Tire Haulers. This series may include, but is not limited to: application, local business Tax ID/FIN data, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 1 Year after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the identification of waste tire piles and their various attributes, including the location, age, property owner, and number of tires. This series may include, but is not limited to: access agreements and correspondence.
